title: Satanic porn star who founded own cult has face tattoos with occult symbols
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

A Satanic porn star and cult leader who claims to have regular chats with the devil has unveiled demonic new facial tattoos.

Sabrina Sabrok, who has previously made headlines after undergoing more than 50 cosmetic operations to give her "the biggest bum in the world", shared a video on Instagram.

It shows the 43-year-old Argentine Playboy model's new occult symbols.

She told local media: "I had my face tattooed because most of my body is already covered.

"I dared to do it with Herchell Carrasco at the Pachuco Tattoo studio. I checked online and saw he has tattooed many famous people in Hollywood.

(Image: CEN/@sabrinasabrokreal)

(Image: CEN/@sabrinasabrokreal)

"I asked him to ink satanic symbols such as stars, the moon and a black widow. I plan to get more tattoos done on my face and neck, I want to cover my entire body.

"I do not have any problems having my face tattooed because, at the end of the day, I am my own boss.

"I do porn, I have my own production company and I do not have to ask anyone for permission."

It sparked a mixed reaction from people posting online.

(Image: CEN/@sabrinasabrokreal)

One named 'Eroticajayne' wrote: "No please, you are so beautiful."

'Melkiluu' commented: "She ruined her face."

'Daniel082018' wrote: "You are the most beautiful woman in the world."

Earlier this year, the porn star launched her own cult called 'Sabrok Legion' which offers interested parties the chance to make pacts with the Devil and 'Our Lady of Holy Death' as well as learn how to cast love charms and speak with the dead.

She told local media: "I was an atheist, but I started to do things with Our Lady of Holy Death and it felt good so I got into a cult and later had ideas of a satanic church.

(Image: CEN/@sabrinasabrokreal)

"I then set up the 'Sabrok Legion' because voices told me to launch a black magic cult linked to Satanism and Saint Death."

She also claims to be able to parley with Satan himself and that "everything I do is because I made a pact with him".

The porn star, who reportedly has Rh negative blood, also recently claimed that she is an alien, telling local media: "I worked with researchers and they told me that my blood type is not from this planet."
description: Sabrina Sabrok, 43, unveiled the new look on her Instagram page, to mixed responses
